description:
Summary Description:
Join our pioneering non-profit organization dedicated to advancing technology development to promote propane as a clean, domestic, and affordable energy source. As the Senior Manager of Material Handling Business Development, you will drive initiatives to maximize propane gallon sales in various material handling markets.

Compensation and Benefits:
- Competitive salary
- Vacation and sick pay
- 401(k) retirement plan
- Health benefits including Vision and Dental
- Life insurance
- Long-term disability coverage
- Supportive work environment

Why you should apply for this position today:
- Be a part of a progressive organization shaping the future of energy technology
- Work with a dedicated team focused on expanding propane adoption
- Opportunity for remote work and travel
- Competitive salary and excellent benefits package

Skills:
- Goal-oriented with measurable strategy implementation metrics
- Ability to build and nurture relationships with manufacturing partners and stakeholders
- Expertise in material handling markets and business case analysis
- Strong verbal and written communication skills
- Proficient in public speaking
- Basic project management skills
- Excellent judgment

Responsibilities:
- Develop market strategies and business plans to promote propane in material handling markets
- Support product launches and maintain/grow market segments
- Identify growth opportunities through collaboration with OEMs and decision makers
- Serve as a liaison between the propane industry and material handling markets
- Stay informed about market trends, forecasts, and technologies

Qualifications:
- Proven track record in relationship building and stakeholder management
- Experience in the material handling industry
- Strong communication and public speaking abilities
- Familiarity with professional trade associations and dealer networks
- Alignment with organizational values

Similar Occupations / Job Titles that would be a great fit for this role:
- Business Development Manager in the material handling industry

Education Requirements:
- Bachelor's degree

Education Requirements Credential Category:
- NA

Experience Requirements:
- Previous experience in material handling markets and business development
- Familiarity with OEMs and dealer networks

Why someone should work in Richmon, VA:
- Richmond, VA offers a diverse cultural scene with plenty of historical sites, museums, and outdoor activities.
- The city has a lower cost of living compared to other major cities, making it more affordable for residents.
- Richmond is known for its vibrant food scene, with a wide range of dining options to suit every palate.
- The city is conveniently located, with easy access to the beach, mountains, and other major cities on the East Coast.
